predicate.note: Frames file for 'flout' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Finally , [*-1] flouting the BPCA 's wishes [*] to continue the popular two-mile riverside Esplanade , prized [*] for its expansive views of New York Harbor , the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island , Ms. Bartlett threw up yet another wall , this time concrete , this time 10 1\/2 feet tall .
example.arg: the BPCA 's wishes [*] to continue the popular two-mile riverside Esplanade , prized [*] for its expansive views of New York Harbor , the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island
